statements: SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources;
SELECT resource_title, resource_url FROM digital_literacy_resources;
SELECT resource_title, resource_description FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE resource_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources ORDER BY resource_title DESC;
SELECT resource_title, resource_description FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE resource_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources ORDER BY resource_title DESC;
SELECT resource_id, resource_title FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE resource_id = '12345';
SELECT resource_title, resource_url FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE resource_description LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_resources FROM digital_literacy_resources;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE resource_url LIKE '%.edu%' ORDER BY resource_title ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources;
SELECT title, description FROM digital_literacy_resources;
SELECT category_name FROM categories;
SELECT resource_id, title, url FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM digital_literacy_resources ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE title LIKE '%guide%';
SELECT title, url FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE resource_id > 5 ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources INNER JOIN categories ON digital_literacy_resources.resource_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_resources FROM digital_literacy_resources;
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT title, url FROM resources;
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT resource_id, title, description FROM resources WHERE title LIKE 'Data %';
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id = '3d8729bb-2670-4e9f-ab9f-c6c26749e94a';
SELECT * FROM resources LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, url FROM resources WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT r.title, t.tag_name FROM resources r JOIN resource_tags rt ON r.resource_id = rt.resource_id JOIN tags t ON rt.tag_id = t.tag_id;
SELECT c.category_name, COUNT(r.resource_id) AS total_resources FROM categories c LEFT JOIN resources r ON c.category_id = r.category_id GROUP BY c.category_name;
SELECT r.title, c.category_name FROM resources r JOIN categories c ON r.category_id = c.category_id WHERE r.title ILIKE '%data%' ORDER BY r.title ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_description FROM digital_literacy_resources;
SELECT category_name FROM resource_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, resource_id FROM user_favorites ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT resource_name, resource_url FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE resource_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT r.resource_name, u.username, u.email FROM digital_literacy_resources r JOIN user_favorites uf ON r.resource_id = uf.resource_id JOIN users u ON u.user_id = uf.user_id;

SELECT r.resource_name, u.username, c.category_name FROM digital_literacy_resources r JOIN user_favorites uf ON r.resource_id = uf.resource_id JOIN users u ON u.user_id = uf.user_id JOIN resource_categories c ON c.category_id = r.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE category='Tech'
SELECT title, description FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT author, publication_date FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE author IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM resource_tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, rating FROM resource_reviews WHERE rating > 3
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE category='Education' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM digital_literacy_resources WHERE author IS NOT NULL;
SELECT r.title, rt.tag_name FROM digital_literacy_resources r JOIN resource_tags rt ON r.category = rt.tag_name;
SELECT rr.review_text, rr.rating, dr.title FROM resource_reviews rr JOIN digital_literacy_resources dr ON rr.resource_id = dr.resource_id WHERE rr.rating > 3;
SELECT AVG(rr.rating) AS avg_rating, dl.title FROM resource_ratings rr JOIN digital_literacy_resources dl ON rr.resource_id = dl.resource_id GROUP BY dl.title ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
